recipe.title: Pan-Roasted Sizzling Shrimp
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, seeded, cut into thin strips
1 fresh Anaheim chile, seeded, cut into thin strips
1/2 jalapeño chile, cut lengthwise, seeded, cut into thin strips
1/2 small onion, cut into thin strips (about 1 cup)
instructions: Remove from heat and garnish with: Chopped fresh cilantro Serve hot over Lime-Scented Rice .
Remove from heat and garnish with:
